text:
New York, NY | London, UK

Medidata Solutions is looking for 2 DevOps Engineers to assists in the configuration, management and deployment of SaaS software using Infrastructure as as Service provided by Amazon Web Services.

*nix (Debian/Ubuntu), Ruby, Bash, Chef, Amazon Web Services api, nginx, git, phusion passenger, java, tomcat, EC2, ELB, RDS, S3...
